spell.name: Aries
spell.combatDescription: * Place The Magician on Aries. * While Aries has a card on it, any shields the player generates are multiplied by 2 (Clever: 3). * You may discard the card played on Aries whenever you choose.
spell.skillDescription: * Use Aries to make a Skill check for a skill marked "Fast" as if it were Easy, once per Day.
spell.flavor: The ram is quick and nimble.
